alert.note: Alert for Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 14 at 2:00PM CST until November 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches in southern Lake County and lesser amounts of 3 to 6 inches in northern Cook and Lake counties. * WHERE...Northern Cook and Lake and Southern Lake Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening and morning commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Lake, North Shore
